review: It has it's problems, and can occasionally get buggy while streaming or have issues trying to pick up your Router. I'd only say it's necessary if you don't have a console, blu-ray, or smart tv. I've found it to be extremely useful and financially viable as a streaming product. It would be very useful for that tv in your guest room or the kids play room that doesn't have a receiver to play netflix. There is an app I use in conjunction with this called VideoStream that allows me to stream video files from my laptop in all sorts of formats (mp4, mkv, etc.)
